title: An Act prohibiting body size discrimination

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Rausch, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1249) of Rebecca L. Rausch for legislation to prohibit body size discrimination.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
